landingscreen.punchysummary: Punchy is a digital punch in system that organizes your company's punch-in/out workflow!
landingscreen.employeefeatures: Your employees can easily punch-in, view and ask for alterations in their punches:
landingscreen.managerfeatures: Your managers can accept or deny punch alteration requests:
landingscreen.adminfeatures: Your admin can enroll new employees and managers
landingscreen.getintouch: Get in touch with our sales team now and learn more!

pricingscreen.pricingsummary: Our pricing is based on the number of employees in your company that will interact with Punchy
pricingscreen.employeecategories: That includes three categories: employees, managers and one admin.
pricingscreen.accessdetails: Once a deal is closed, our tech support will enroll your company in our database and give you one admin access to your company.
pricingscreen.adminactions: The admin will then be able to enroll managers and their employees, as long as the total number doesn't exceed the plan that was hired
pricingscreen.testbudget: Test now how much it would cost per month by selecting the number of employees in your company that would interact with punchy:
